body:
V1.49 of Magarena is impossible to start, because my antivirus (AVast 9 free edition, with up-to-date signatures) detects a malware (Win32:Malware.Gen) in "Magarena.exe".

It's been almost one month that i have that problem (signatures in antivirus are updated every day, and it still warn and block me).

No problem with Magarena V1.48, that works fine...
author: [marcjero...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/105934027594611189275/)
title: Virus/Malware in Magarena v1.49 ?

comments.body: 99% sure it is a false positive. Magarena.exe is just a convenience for Windows that lets you run a java program directly. You can also launch it using "java -Xms256M -Xmx512M -jar Magarena.exe" from the command line or as a batch file.
comments.author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)

comments.body: Recent scan of the 1.49 Magarena.exe https://www.metascan-online.com/en/scanresult/file/3d1c36b2fde34d43b12d5d4f68b53d59 On a side note, if you've used the AVast forums, they've been hacked recently, so I'd change your passwords.
comments.author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)

comments.body:
Ok, Metascan is prettier, but their links don't last - https://www.virustotal.com/uk/file/bd66d225a3a27021ed87e83e669486d5848c332ef61aa822742220ad91797ddc/analysis/1401539268/ See issue 458

**Status:** WontFix
comments.author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)

comments.body:
Hi, i can't do what you say because "magarena.exe" is erased as soon as i try to access it. So, the command line doesn't work...
I only write in this forum to inform you that an heuristic signature in "magarena.exe" is known as a virus (and i hope it's false positive !). At the moment, i keep v1.48 and it's fine.
comments.author: [marcjero...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/105934027594611189275/)

content:
_From [marcjero...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/105934027594611189275/) on May 31, 2014 16:28:47_

V1.49 of Magarena is impossible to start, because my antivirus (AVast 9 free edition, with up-to-date signatures) detects a malware (Win32:Malware.Gen) in "Magarena.exe".

It's been almost one month that i have that problem (signatures in antivirus are updated every day, and it still warn and block me).

No problem with Magarena V1.48, that works fine...

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=608_
